interestingFact: Asia is the largest and most populous continent, covering about 30% of the Earth's land area.
Africa is home to the world's longest river, the Nile, and the largest desert, the Sahara.
Australia is the only continent that is also a country and is home to unique wildlife like kangaroos and koalas.
The Amazon Rainforest in South America produces about 20% of the world's oxygen supply.
Europe is home to some of the world's oldest civilizations and historical landmarks Eiffel Tower.
Eurasia is a supercontinent that combines Europe and Asia, covering 36% of the Earth's.
